title: After-Dinner Coffee.
ingredients: Twice the quantity of coffee (or half the amount of liquid) from previous recipes
instructions: For after-dinner coffee use twice the quantity of coffee, or half the amount of liquid, given in previous recipes.
Filtered coffee is often preferred where milk or cream is not used, as is always the case with black coffee.
Serve in after-dinner coffee cups, with or without cut sugar.
notes: Also known as Black Coffee or Caf√© Noir
After-dinner coffee retards gastric digestion; but where the stomach has been overtaxed by a hearty meal, it may prove beneficial, so great are its stimulating effects.
